description: This file defines a Flutter widget called GraphView which renders a visual representation of a graph, including nodes and relationships, using Dart and Flutter framework components.

classes.name: GraphView
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a graphical overview of nodes and relationships from a GraphResult object.

classes.name: _CardContainer
classes.description: A helper widget for displaying a titled card containing a list widget.

methods.name: _colorForType
methods.description: Determines color based on the type string, used to visually distinguish node types.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the GraphView including layout, nodes, relationships, and metrics.

methods.name: _metricChip
methods.description: Creates a stylized Chip widget displaying a metric label and value.
